title: Training abruptly ends - no message?
body:
hi,

I was curious to try out this yolov3 implementation on my Windows PC. 

Side note: It was a bit of a struggle to get things up-and-running (because the `requirements.txt` wasn't complete and because there were a bunch of `os.system` commands that probably only work on Linux)

Anyway, I did a small test run with a small dataset and found that the training runs for only a minute and then abruptly ends.

This is the output:

> (venv) C:\bbi\NN\ultralytics\yolov3>**`python train.py --data SmallExport01\detectordata.txt --cfg SmallExport01\yolov3-custom.cfg --weights weights\yolov3.weights --img-size 384`**
> 
> Apex recommended for faster mixed precision training: https://github.com/NVIDIA/apex
> Namespace(accumulate=4, adam=False, batch_size=16, bucket='', cache_images=False, cfg='SmallExport01\\yolov3-custom.cfg', data='SmallExport01\\detectordata.txt', device='', epochs=300, evolve=False, img_size=[384], multi_scale=False, name='', nosave=False, notest=False, rect=False, resume=False, single_cls=False, weights='weights\\yolov3.weights')
> Using CUDA device0 _CudaDeviceProperties(name='GeForce RTX 2060 SUPER', total_memory=8192MB)
> 
> Start Tensorboard with "tensorboard --logdir=runs", view at http://localhost:6006/
> Model Summary: 222 layers, 6.16907e+07 parameters, 6.16907e+07 gradients
> Caching labels (213 found, 0 missing, 0 empty, 0 duplicate, for 213 images): 100%|█████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████| 213/213 [00:00<00:00, 6883.11it/s]
> Caching labels (37 found, 0 missing, 0 empty, 0 duplicate, for 37 images): 100%|█████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████| 37/37 [00:00<00:00, 7379.77it/s]
> Image sizes 384 - 384 train, 384 test
> Using 8 dataloader workers
> Starting training for 300 epochs...
> 
>      Epoch   gpu_mem      GIoU       obj       cls     total   targets  img_size
> Apex recommended for faster mixed precision training: https://github.com/NVIDIA/apex
> [CUT]
> Apex recommended for faster mixed precision training: https://github.com/NVIDIA/apex
>   0%|                                                                                                                                                                                       | 0/14 [00:00<?, ?it/s]

... And that's it, there is no further `stdout / stderr` output

**Is there a log file that I can check to see what went wrong ?**

PS: I think it does _something_, because it quickly runs out of memory with the default image size (512) : `RuntimeError: CUDA out of memory. Tried to allocate 64.00 MiB (GPU 0; 8.00 GiB total capacity; 6.01 GiB already allocated; 47.97 MiB free; 6.03 GiB reserved in total by PyTorch)`

Thanks in advance,
Lambert
